body.p: This week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter covers the Gentoo Managers' Meetings held on the 12th and the 26th of last month. A number of issues were discussed at these meetings, including what could be done if developers had access to more hardware, and Gentoo Enterprise/Server, an enterprise-friendly version of Gentoo. We also announce the next BugDay, which will be held on Saturday, February 7. There's plenty of other content too, so do take a look. Enjoy!
